cuaca.title: CUACA
cuaca.value:
$if(ai(isday),
if(wi(code)=WINDY, gv(icons)+wind.svg,
    wi(code)=TORNADO, gv(icons)+tornado.svg,
    wi(code)=BLUSTERY, gv(icons)+wind.svg,

    wi(code)=TROPICAL_STORM, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-day.svg,
    wi(code)=HURRICANE, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SEVERE_THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+severe-thunderstorm.svg,
    wi(code)=THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+thunderstorms.svg,
    wi(code)=ISOLATED_THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+isolated-thunderstorms-day.svg,
    wi(code)=THUNDERSHOWERS, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-day.svg,
    wi(code)=ISOLATED_THUNDERSHOWERS, gv(icons)+isolated-thunderstorms-day.svg,

    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_SNOW, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_SNOW_SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=FREEZING_DRIZZLE, freezing,
    wi(code)=FREEZING_RAIN, freezing,
    wi(code)=HAIL, freezing,
    wi(code)=SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_AND_HAIL, freezing,

    wi(code)=DRIZZLE, gv(icons)+rainy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SHOWERS, gv(icons)+rainy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=HEAVY_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+rainy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SCATTERED_SHOWERS,gv(icons)+rainy-3-day.svg ,

    wi(code)=SNOW_FLURRIES, gv(icons)+snowy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=LIGHT_SNOW_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+snowy-day.svg,
    wi(code)=BLOWING_SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=HEAVY_SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SCATTERED_SNOW_SHOWERS,gv(icons)+snowy-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SNOW_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+snowy-3-day.svg,

    wi(code)=DUST, gv(icons)+fog-day.svg,
    wi(code)=FOGGY, gv(icons)+fog-day.svg,
    wi(code)=HAZE, gv(icons)+fog-day.svg,
    wi(code)=SMOKY, gv(icons)+fog-day.svg,

    wi(code)=CLOUDY,gv(icons)+cloudy-1-day.svg,
    wi(code)=MOSTLY_CLOUDY, gv(icons)+cloudy-1-day.svg, gv(icons)+clear-day.svg)
    ,
if(wi(code)=WINDY, gv(icons)+wind.svg,
  wi(code)=TORNADO, gv(icons)+tornado.svg,
     wi(code)=BLUSTERY, gv(icons)+wind.svg,

    wi(code)=TROPICAL_STORM, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-night.svg,
    wi(code)=HURRICANE, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SEVERE_THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+severe-thunderstorm.svg,
    wi(code)=THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+thunderstorms.svg,
    wi(code)=ISOLATED_THUNDERSTORMS, gv(icons)+isolated-thunderstorms-night.svg,
    wi(code)=THUNDERSHOWERS, gv(icon)+thunder-showers-night.svg,
    wi(code)=ISOLATED_THUNDERSHOWERS, gv(icons)+isolated-thunderstorms-night.svg,

    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_SNOW, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_SNOW_SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=FREEZING_DRIZZLE, freezing,
    wi(code)=FREEZING_RAIN, freezing,
    wi(code)=HAIL, freezing,
    wi(code)=SLEET, freezing,
    wi(code)=MIXED_RAIN_AND_HAIL, freezing,

    wi(code)=DRIZZLE, gv(icons)+rainy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SHOWERS, gv(icons)+rainy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=HEAVY_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+rainy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SCATTERED_SHOWERS,gv(icons)+rainy-3-night.svg ,

    wi(code)=SNOW_FLURRIES, gv(icons)+snowy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=LIGHT_SNOW_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+snowy-night.svg,
    wi(code)=BLOWING_SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=HEAVY_SNOW, gv(icons)+snowy-3-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SCATTERED_SNOW_SHOWERS,gv(icons)+snowy-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SNOW_SHOWERS, gv(icons)+snowy-3-night.svg,

    wi(code)=DUST, gv(icons)+fog-night.svg,
    wi(code)=FOGGY, gv(icons)+fog-night.svg,
    wi(code)=HAZE, gv(icons)+fog-night.svg,
    wi(code)=SMOKY, gv(icons)+fog-night.svg,

    wi(code)=CLOUDY, gv(icons)+cloudy-3-night.svg,

    wi(code)=MOSTLY_CLOUDY, gv(icons)+cloudy-1-night.svg,gv(icons)+clear-night.svg)
)$
